name: ClientComponent
description: Client-side component wrapper that dynamically loads and renders components from the client component registry

componentName.description: Name of the client component to load from the registry

props.description: Props to pass to the loaded component

serverData.description: Server-side data to merge with props

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the wrapper

title.description: Title text to pass to the client component

subtitle.description: Subtitle text to pass to the client component

titleContainerClassName.description: CSS classes for the title/subtitle container wrapper

titleClassName.description: CSS classes for the title element

subtitleClassName.description: CSS classes for the subtitle element

cta.description: Call-to-action button configuration with label, href, optional icon, variant, and styling

href.description: URL or path for the button link

external.description: Whether the link opens in a new tab

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the button

examples.name: Basic Client Component
examples.description: Load a client-side component from the registry
